      Methods in netwerk with parameters of type ClientHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Server.addHandler(ClientHandler clienthandler)
      Add a clienthandler to the list of threads, when a client has connected.
      void Server.addRematch(ClientHandler clienthandler)
      Add a client to the map of rematches.
      java.lang.String Server.gameIsOver(ClientHandler clienthandler)
      Send a message to the client with the reason why the game is over.
      void Server.handleCommands(java.lang.String command, ClientHandler clienthandler)
      Handle all the incoming commands from the client.
      java.lang.String Server.moveResult(int move, ClientHandler clienthandler)
      Bij een validmove zal de server zijn versie van Game, de volgende speler de beurt geven.
      void Server.removeClient(ClientHandler clienthandler)
      Remove a client
      java.lang.String Server.turn(ClientHandler clienthandler)
      Send to the client, whose turn it currently is.
